snippet: The Chinese Embassy expressed shock on Sunday over a riot involving local workers at a Chinese-run sugar plant and criticized Madagascar’s government for failing to protect Chinese interests.
abstract: Chinese Embassy expresses shock over riot involving local workers at a Chinese-run sugar plant in Madagascar; accuses local government of failing to protect Chinese interests.
lead_paragraph: The Chinese Embassy expressed shock on Sunday over a riot involving local workers at a Chinese-run sugar plant and criticized Madagascar’s government for failing to protect Chinese interests.
